ValidationRule.description: To restrict cases closing with status Done for Origin SAP Interface
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: TEXT(Origin) = 'SAP Interface' && TEXT(Status) = 'Done' && $Profile.Name != 'System Administrator' && $Profile.Name != 'DeniedPartyScreeningAPIUser' && $Profile.Name != 'API DATA LOAD' && $Profile.Name !='Portal API User RO Automation' && $Profile.Name !='Portal API User - RFQ' && $Profile.Name !='Portal API User - Self-Registration' && $Profile.Name !='Portal Interfaces App User' && $Profile.Name !='Portal User - Self-Registration' && $Profile.Name !='Portal API User - Self-Registration (US)' && $Profile.Name !='Portal Hon Adminstrator' && $Profile.Name !='Portal API User - MCORE' && $User.Id !='005300000042rPL' && $User.Id != '005a0000007vvzm' && $User.Id !='005300000041m9d'
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Status cannot be changed to DONE for SAP Interface cases
